title: Lily Allen's romance with Stranger Things' David Harbour heats up as she meets his parents
text:
They were first linked back in August after they were spotted going on a date night at The Piccadilly Theatre.

And Lily Allen's relationship with David Harbour appears to be going from strength-to-strength as she supported him during his SNL appearance in New York on Saturday.

The singer, 34, cut a stylish figure as she arrived at the SNL after-party with David, 44, and his dad, Kenneth.

Sweet: Lily Allen's relationship with David Harbour appears to be going from strength-to-strength as she supported him during his SNL appearance in New York on Saturday

Tying her raven locks into a high bun, Lily wrapped up in a long black coat and toted a large Chanel handbag.

David, meanwhile, looked worlds away from his Stranger Things character Jim Hopper as he ditched his big beard for a freshly-shaven look.

And it seems the couple's romance is heating up, with David having introduced Lily to his parents.

Family outing: The singer, 34, cut a stylish figure as she arrived at the SNL after-party with David, 44, and his dad, Kenneth

While they are yet to publicly comment on the status of the relationship, Lily and David have been spotted on a string of dates since August.

Their date night comes a day after David revealed he has bipolar disorder, which he was diagnosed with in his 20s.

The actor told Blank Podcast: 'First of all the interesting thing about my own particular brand of it is that I never have an episode when I working.

'So, in some way I’ve generally been able to see a link between my own creative energies when they are channelled into some kind of work form and that when they are not channelled that it goes off into some kind of madness.'

'In that way, it has made working even more vital to me, it’s kind of a lifeline.'

Dapper: David, meanwhile, looked worlds away from his Stranger Things character Jim Hopper as he ditched his big beard for a freshly-shaven look

Lily separated from husband Sam Cooper in 2015 after about four years marriage. The former couple announced they finalized their divorce in 2018.

They each share joint custody of their two children: daughters Ethel, seven, and Marnie, six.

While Lily and Sam aren't together any more, she admitted they are still 'really friendly'.

During an interview on Loose Women back in 2018, she said: '[Our custody agreement] wasn't really something we discussed, we're both really friendly, our kids go to school equidistant between our houses, so it works.'

Leading character: The screen star plays the role of police chief Jim Hopper in Netflix's Stranger Things (pictured)

Amid their separation, the songstress dated grime DJ MC Meridian Dan, real name Daniel Lawrence London.

The pair first started dating three years ago and the Smile hitmaker told How To Fail podcast host Elizabeth Day that she and Dan had broken up in December 2018.

She said at the time: 'I’m single, for the first time since I was about 15. I’ve just come back from a tour in America, which is where I was when things went wrong with Sam, and the same thing happened in my current relationship.

'I mean, I didn’t take lots of drugs and have lots of sex with other people. I just became very lost.'
description: Lily Allen's relationship with David Harbour appears to be going from strength-to-strength as she supported him during his SNL appearance in New York on Saturday.
